title: 164. The Coronavirus/Self-Quarantine Special
description:
Today we're being careful, on quarantine, coming at you responsibly, and reminding you to take this seriously as well. We discuss the latest with Coronavirus, Italians being emotional and singing, being cooped up, Jean-Claude Van Damme, cucks who hoard toilet paper, and arguing with people on Twitter. Please be careful and stay healthy out there, babies!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
